CreateProtocolMixCommand.title: Schema for the MixInfo of the spirent.methodology.CreateProtocolMixCommand.
CreateProtocolMixCommand.description: allOf doesn't inherit, but indepdently validates JSON (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/22689900/json-schema-allof-with-additionalproperties) using referenced schemas. Switched to use multiple references to keep additionalProperties false

enable.description: A flag indicating if this object should be merged into the template configuration.

deviceCount.description: Total Device Count for StmTemplateMix distribution.

table.description: A list of table rows that make up the mixture.

weight.description: If value is followed by %, this is the percent weight of the total deviceCount to assign to this component. Otherwise, this becomes a static deviceCount value.

devicesPerBlock.description: Number that indicates how many device will be assigned per device block.  If 0, devicesPerBlock indicates all deviceCount is assigned to one block. If 1, devicesPerBlock = # of device blocks with a device count of 1. If devicesPerBlock > device count of component (after weight is applied), all devices go into one block.  Otherwise, blocks are greedily created until we run out of device count (ie. deviceCount = 17, devicesPerBlock = 5, blocks created with 5, 5, 5, 2 devices).

appliedValue.description: Load actually assigned to this component.  Autocalculated, do not set.
